title: Graphics Designer
description:
The Mission 

At Inner World Training (IWT), we believe quiet is powerful. We help introverted leaders and aspiring coaches build impact-driven businesses without compromising their authentic selves. We are looking for a Senior Designer to serve as our "Visual Architect," ensuring every touchpoint—from ads to high-level workbooks—feels premium and intentional.



The Role 

This is not a "task-taker" role. We are looking for a Visual Storyteller. You will own the visual identity of our flagship programs. You will work with our team to create designs that are fast, efficient, and breathtakingly beautiful.



What You Will Do:

Ad Creative: Design high-converting static and carousel ads for
 and Instagram.

Funnel Assets: Build landing page layouts, custom icons, and section graphics within GoHighLevel and ClickFunnels.

Content Support: Create high-quality YouTube thumbnails and social media assets.

Client Delivery: Design and update premium PDF workbooks and slide decks for our Elite and Platinu
mbers.

AI Integration: Use AI tools to speed up asset generation while maintaining high brand standards without losing the human touch.

Collaborate: You’ll be the "connective tissue" between our Video, Social Media, and Tech teams.



Technical Requirements

Adobe Creative Suite Mastery: 3+ years of professional experience in Photoshop and Illustrator. You must be comfortable with high-end photo manipulation and vector creation.

Canva Proficiency: Ability to work quickly in Canva for templated assets and social posts.

AI Design Workflow: Proven experience using generative AI tools (e.g., Midjourney, Adobe Firefly, or Leonardo) to enhance creative output.

Design Aesthetic: A portfolio demonstrating a clean, sophisticated, and modern aesthetic. We value white space, high-end typography, and "Quiet Power" over loud or cluttered designs.

The Hidden Test: We value attention to detail. In the application form below, the very first question will ask for the sum of 14 + 6. Please ensure your answer is correct.

Execution Speed: Ability to manage multiple projects and deliver first drafts within a 24-48 hour window.



The Benefits:

Fully remote role (Work from anywhere).

Competitive salary based on skills (?25,000 – ?40,000 PHP per month when turned Full-Time)

Work with a mission-driven team focusing on a Transformative Experience for their clients.



How to Apply:

We prioritize candidates who can follow instructions meticulously.

To apply, please complete this brief application form:

title: Media Buyer
description:
THE OPPORTUNITY



Are you a data-driven Media Buyer in the Philippines ready to scale ad spend from 30K to 100K+ monthly while working with successful coaches and consultants earning 120K TO 400K+ annually?



Inner World Training is searching for an experienced
 Ads specialist to replace our agency and take full ownership of paid advertising for our high-ticket coaching clients. You'll manage 6-figure monthly ad budgets, work directly with our Marketing Manager, and drive measurable business results for entrepreneurs building market-leading businesses.



WHY THIS ROLE IS DIFFERENT



Scale Real Businesses with Proven Systems

You're not just "running ads" - you're the engine behind scaling coaching businesses that have already generated 5M+. Your campaigns will drive leads for high?ticket programs, serving clients across Singapore, Malaysia, USA, Europe and beyond. You'll see the direct impact of your work in business transformations, not just vanity metrics.



Build an International-Standard Portfolio

Working with a Singapore-based company serving global clients means your portfolio will showcase international-standard campaigns. You'll manage budgets most Filipino media buyers never touch (5 to 6 figures monthly), gain experience with high-ticket funnels, and build case studies that position you as a premium ads specialist. This experience is gold for your career growth.



Learn from Million-Dollar Businesses

Direct exposure to a 7-figure founder’s marketing strategies and systems that have generated $5M+ in results. You're not just executing - you're learning business building, funnel optimization, and scaling strategies from founders who practice what they preach. We'll train you on our methodologies, AI tools, and optimization frameworks.



Clear Career Progression with Real Salary Growth

We promote from within based on results, not tenure. Proven path: Media Buyer ? Senior Ads Strategist ? Ads Director. Typical timeframe: 12-18 months for strong performers with 20-30% salary increases. As Inner World Training scales (our goal is 10X growth over next 3 years), you'll grow faster than traditional employment.



Work with a Talented Creative Team

You won't be alone trying to make bad creatives work. We're hiring a dedicated Creative Specialist (10-20 new creatives weekly) so you have fresh ad variations to test constantly. Your job is strategy, optimization, and scaling - not begging for new ads. This is how professional media buying should work.



THE ROLE: BECOME THE ADS STRATEGIST, NOT JUST THE BUTTON-PUSHER



You're not just a Media Buyer executing campaigns - you're the Ads Strategist and Scaling Expert for Inner World Training' client portfolio, making data-driven decisions that directly impact business growth and contribute to our track record of $5M+.



Every campaign you manage serves real entrepreneurs trying to become market leaders in competitive industries. You'll work closely with our Marketing Manager to optimize the entire funnel - from lead generation to workshop applications to mastermind inquiries - using systematic testing, strategic scaling, and performance analysis.



Your role is critical: replace an agency that ran the same 5 static ads for months without proper optimization. We need someone who understands that scaling requires constant creative testing, audience expansion, and data-informed decision-making.



RESPONSIBILITIES: WHAT YOU'LL DO DAILY



Primary Function: Campaign Management & Optimization (60-70% of time)



- Manage
 Ads campaigns with monthly ad spend scaling from 30K to 100K+ for coaching/consulting funnels (webinar registrations, workshop applications, mastermind inquiries)

- Execute systematic testing strategy: 20% of budget on testing new audiences, creatives, and angles; 80% on scaling winning combinations using ABO, CBO, and advanced
 settings

- Optimize campaigns daily based on KPI metrics (CPL, CPA, conversion rates, ROI) - adjust budgets, pause underperformers, scale winners, troubleshoot when CPLs exceed targets

- Analyze performance data to identify trends, opportunities, and problems - translate numbers into actionable insights for Marketing Manager and the team

- Collaborate with Creative Specialist on ad brief requirements - specify what angles, hooks, and formats to test based on performance data (you'll receive 10-20 new creatives weekly to test)



Strategic Function: Scaling & Growth (20-30% of time)

- Develop scaling strategies for winning campaigns - know when to use horizontal scaling (new ad sets), vertical scaling (budget increases), or campaign duplication based on account performance

- Conduct audience research to identify new targeting opportunities - lookalikes, interest stacking, competitor audiences, custom audiences from client data

- Test new campaign structures to beat control performance - different objectives, placements, bidding strategies, and funnel approaches

- Monitor lead quality metrics beyond just CPL - track show-up rates, application rates, sales conversion to ensure we're attracting qualified leads, not just cheap clicks

- Propose funnel improvements based on ad performance data - if certain angles convert better, suggest landing page tests or offer adjustments to Marketing Manager



Collaboration & Communication (10-15% of time)

- Weekly strategy calls with Marketing Manager and potentially client to review performance, discuss optimization plans, align on priorities (calls during Singapore business hours SGT UTC+8)

- Daily updates on campaign performance - proactive communication about wins, issues, and action plans (no need to wait for someone to ask)

- Create performance reports showing key metrics, insights, and recommendations - translate data into business language that clients understand

- Coordinate with Creative Specialist on creative briefs, feedback, and iteration priorities based on what's working in campaigns



Learning & Systems Building (Ongoing)

- Document successful strategies in SOPs and playbooks for scaling, testing protocols, troubleshooting guides to build institutional knowledge

- Stay updated on
 Ads platform changes, new features, industry best practices for info product/coaching funnels

 -Experiment with new platforms (YouTube Ads bonus) when ready to expand beyond
 for client acquisition

- Participate in Inner World Training training on AI tools, marketing frameworks, and business-building strategies to level up your strategic thinking



RESULTS: HOW WE MEASURE SUCCESS



1. Quality & Consistency

Deliver campaigns that consistently meet Inner World Training' performance standards with improving efficiency over time. First 90 days: learn our funnels, client businesses, and optimization frameworks. After onboarding: demonstrate mastery of our systems with minimal revision cycles and proactive problem-solving.



2. Performance Impact

Produce ad campaigns that achieve or exceed target KPIs for cost per lead, cost per application, and cost per sale. Your work drives measurable business results tracked through funnel analytics: webinar registrations, workshop applications, mastermind inquiries, and revenue attribution. Target: maintain CPL below agreed benchmarks while scaling spend from 30K?100K monthly.



3. Reliability & Professionalism

Meet campaign management expectations with 95%+ on-time delivery of optimizations, daily monitoring during active campaigns, zero critical errors (wrong audiences, broken tracking, budget overspend), and proactive communication about challenges. When CPLs spike or campaigns underperform, you flag it immediately with analysis and proposed solutions - don't wait for someone to notice.



4. Growth & Improvement

Demonstrate measurable skill development and efficiency gains quarter-over-quarter. Reduce time-to-proficiency on new campaigns, increase testing velocity, develop specialized expertise in high-ticket coaching funnels, and contribute strategic insights beyond just execution. We want Media Buyers who become Ads Strategists.



5. Business Contribution

Support company growth through campaign performance that drives business results: lead generation for workshops, applications for masterminds, client ROI improvements, and cost efficiency gains. Your success = client success = Inner World Training growth = your career growth and compensation increases.



REQUIREMENTS: THE MUST-HAVES



Experience & Skills

? Minimum 2-3 years professional experience as Media Buyer / Ads Specialist with proven track record managing 6-figure monthly ad spend (?4M+ monthly minimum) - this is non-negotiable

? Expert proficiency in
 Ads Manager - you can navigate every setting, understand campaign structures (ABO vs CBO), bidding strategies, placement optimization, pixel setup, conversion tracking, and custom audience creation without Googling

? Portfolio/case studies showing specific campaigns you've managed with results (ad spend levels, CPL/CPA achieved, scaling progression, optimization strategies used)

? Data-driven decision-making skills - can read analytics, identify patterns, explain causation vs correlation, and translate numbers into strategic recommendations

? Understanding of high-ticket funnels (webinar ? workshop ? mastermind model) OR willingness to learn info product/coaching business models quickly (we'll train you on our specific funnels)

? YouTube Ads experience is a bonus but not required - we may expand to YouTube later, so if you have this skill, mention it

Technical Setup (Remote Work Requirements)

? Reliable internet connection - minimum 25 Mbps for video calls and large file uploads/downloads (ad creatives, reports)

? Desktop/laptop with sufficient specs for running multiple browser tabs, analytics tools, and screen sharing during calls (minimum 8GB RAM recommended)

? Quiet workspace for video calls and focused work - you'll have regular calls during Singapore business hours

? Backup power/internet - acknowledge Philippines infrastructure challenges; have contingency plan for outages

Communication & Work Style

? English proficiency - must be able to write clear reports, communicate strategy in calls, and collaborate professionally with Singapore-based founders and international team

? Responsive during Singapore business hours (SGT UTC+8) - not just "available for core collaboration hours" but actually working and responsive during standard business hours for team collaboration, urgent optimizations, and client needs (8 AM - 6 PM SGT)

? Remote work discipline - self-managed, organized, doesn't need constant supervision, creates structure for yourself, delivers consistently without hand-holding

? Proactive communication style - flag issues early, ask clarifying questions when needed, keep stakeholders updated without being prompted, don't let problems fester into crises

? Growth mindset and learning orientation -
 changes constantly, our business evolves, you need to stay curious and adaptable, not rigid in "how I've always done it"

? Systematic and process-oriented - can follow testing protocols, document what works, build repeatable systems, not just "try random things and see what happens"



Inner World Training Culture Fit

? Alignment with our values: Give value first, radical honesty, working smart in the right direction, positioning yourself (and others) for success

? Excited about helping coaches and consultants become market leaders - genuinely inspired by transformation stories and $5M+ impact we've created

? Comfortable in results-driven environment where performance is measured, celebrated, and directly tied to compensation and career growth

? Ownership mentality - you think about business impact, suggest improvements, take pride in results, care about Inner World Training' success because you see your role in the bigger picture



Logistics & Travel

? Valid passport for international travel (or willing to obtain one)

? Able to travel to Singapore, Malaysia, or Southeast Asia 2 times per year for team masterminds and company events (all expenses covered by Inner World Training)

? Flexibility with occasional weekend work during major campaign launches or urgent optimizations (rare, but launches don't always happen Monday-Friday)



What's Included Beyond Base Salary:

? Performance-based bonuses - amount varies based on campaign results, client ROI, and scaling milestones achieved (we reward excellence)

? Access to Inner World Training training programs - AI strategies, marketing frameworks, business building methodologies valued at 5,000+ (same training our $15K-$60K mastermind clients receive)

? Fully paid trips to Singapore, Malaysia, or Southeast Asia 2x/year - flights, accommodation, meals, and activities covered for team masterminds and company events (experience $3,000-5,000 value annually)

? Software subscriptions provided -
 Ads access, analytics tools, reporting software, collaboration platforms

? Portfolio usage rights for all campaigns you manage - build international-standard case studies for your career growth

? Professional mentorship from 7-figure founder, and exposure to client success strategies



Work Benefits:

? 100% remote work - work from anywhere in the Philippines with reliable internet

? Flexible schedule with deliverable-based expectations - as long as you're responsive during Singapore business hours and campaigns perform, we trust you to manage your time

? 15 days annual leave + sick leave observed

? Equipment support if needed for professional setup



Career Growth:

- Annual salary reviews with raises based on performance and skill development. Typical increases: 20-30% for strong performers within 12-18 months.

- Clear progression path fro
dia Buyer ? Senior Ads Strategist ? Ads Director as you demonstrate results and grow with Inner World Training.



Inner World Training Growth Philosophy:

We promote from within based on results, not tenure. Several of our current tea
mbers started in junior roles and now lead their departments. We invest heavily in developing our people because we're building a company for the long term.



As Inner World Training scales (our goal is 10X growth over next 3 years), you'll have opportunities to grow faster than in traditional employment. Plus, with twice-yearly trips to Singapore and Southeast Asia, you'll build relationships and gain exposure that accelerates your career development.



WHAT MAKES YOU THE PERFECT FIT



Acts Like an Owner

You don't just execute tasks - you think about business impact, suggest improvements, and take pride in results. When CPLs spike, you don't wait for someone to tell you to fix it - you troubleshoot, test solutions, and report back with what you tried and what's working. You care about Inner World Training' success because you see your role in the bigger picture of helping coaches become market leaders.



Never Stops Learning

 Ads evolves fast, and our business is at the cutting edge of AI and marketing innovation. You're genuinely excited to learn new platform features, experiment with new targeting strategies, and constantly level up your craft. You see working at Inner World Training as a masterclass in modern business building, not just a job running ads.



Communicates Proactively

You flag issues early, ask clarifying questions when needed, and keep stakeholders updated without being prompted. You don't let problems fester into crises. In a remote environment with a Singapore-based leadership team, clear communication isn't optional - it's essential. When campaigns underperform, you're the first to say "Here's what's happening and here's my plan to fix it."



Balances Data with Strategy

You understand that excellent media buying isn't just about low CPLs - it's about achieving business objectives. You can explain the "why" behind every optimization decision, not just the "what." You know when to kill a campaign vs when to give it more time. You understand that cheap leads don't matter if they don't convert to sales. You think in ROI, not just cost per click.



Thrives in Remote Work

You're disciplined, organized, and don't need constant supervision. You create structure for yourself, manage your time effectively, and deliver consistently. You're comfortable with asynchronous communication but also responsive during Singapore business hours when real-time collaboration is needed. You've proven you can work independently and still be a great team player.



Cares About the Mission

You're genuinely inspired by helping coaches and consultants build market-leading businesses. Seeing client testimonials, transformation stories, and the $45M+ impact we've created excites you. You want to be part of something meaningful, not just collect a paycheck. You believe in abundance over scarcity and want to contribute to others' success.



Systematic and Process-Driven

You don't just "wing it" with ad campaigns. You follow testing protocols, document what works, build playbooks for scaling, and create systems that others can replicate. You're the type who organizes campaign naming conventions, tracks metrics in spreadsheets, and can explain your entire optimization process step-by-step. You bring order to chaos.



Comfortable with Fast-Paced Growth

You're ambitious and excited by the challenge of scaling ad spend from 30K to 100K+ monthly. You don't get overwhelmed by increasing budgets - you get energized. You understand that with growth comes change, and you're adaptable enough to evolve your strategies as the business scales. You want to grow your career as fast as Inner World Training grows.



THE FILTER QUIZ

We value attention to detail and candidates who read thoroughly. Please complete this short quiz and include your answers in your application
 to demonstrate you've read and understood the role.



Answer these 3 questions in your application
:



Question 1: According to the ROLE section, what is the primary identity we're looking for beyond just "Media Buyer"? (Answer is a 4-word phrase starting with "Ads...")



Question 2: According to the "Why This Role Is Different" section, how many times per year will we fly you to Singapore, Malaysia, or Southeast Asia for team masterminds?



Question 3: According to the RESPONSIBILITIES section, what percentage of your testing budget should be allocated to testing new audiences/creatives vs scaling winning combinations?



BONUS: How much in documented client results has Inner World Training generated? (Hint: It's in the opening section and mentioned throughout)



HOW TO APPLY



1. Send an
 to: 

Subject line: "Media Buyer Application - [Your Name]"



2. Include in your
:

? Your resume/CV (PDF format preferred)

? Link to your portfolio or case studies - Google Drive folder, PDF document, or online portfolio showing:

- At least 2-3 campaigns you've managed with results (ad spend levels, CPL/CPA, scaling progression)

- Screenshots of ad account dashboards showing spend levels (can blur client names)

- Before/after optimization examples

- Any creative strategy work you've done

? Answers to the 3 Filter Quiz questions above (including bonus if applicable)

? Brief response (3-5 sentences maximum): "What's your approach to scaling a campaign when CPLs are below target but you want to maintain efficiency? Walk me through your decision-making process."



3. Portfolio Requirements:

Please ensure your portfolio includes:

- 2-3 detailed case studies of campaigns you've managed (even if you can't share client names, show the strategy and results)

- Proof of 6-figure monthly ad spend - dashboard screenshots, client testimonials, or agency confirmation

- Variety demonstrating your range - different objectives (lead gen, conversions, traffic), audience types, creative formats

- One example of a campaign you troubleshooted when performance declined - what was the problem and how did you fix it?

- For candidates without traditional portfolio access: Include a detailed written case study explaining your most successful campaign - the strategy, testing approach, optimization process, and results achieved.



4. What Happens Next:

? We review applications within 3-5 business days

? Qualified candidates receive Zoom interview invitation

? Interview process: 2 rounds total over 2-3 weeks (all via Zoom)

- Round 1 (45-60 min): Portfolio deep-dive and cultural fit conversation with Marketing Manager - we'll review your campaigns, ask about your optimization process, discuss work style and communication approach



- Round 2 (45-60 min): Strategy interview with Bryan Ang covering scaling methodologies, troubleshooting scenarios, business thinking, and alignment with Inner World Training mission



? Paid trial project: We'll pay you SGD $
to manage a small test campaign for 1-2 weeks - you'll optimize an existing funnel with limited budget to demonstrate your decision-making process (this is the final step before full hire)

? Successful candidate starts with 30-day probation period to ensure mutual fit before transitioning to full employment



Timeline: We're looking to fill this role by December 2024 (immediate hiring process).



Questions?
 
 with subject line "Question About Media Buyer Role"



What We Do & Who We Serve



Inner World Training™ helps new coaches, consultants, and experts start and grow their coaching business into mission-driven businesses.



Our clients have a calling, a passion and an expertise, so they want to build a business that reflects what they love.



They come to us because they know they’re meant for more, feeling trust fatigue in their market, and want a brand that commands respect — without relying on ads, shouting online, or chasing clients.



Our Track Record

We’ve helped 400+ clients across 30+ countries start and grow their coaching businesses organically, from getting their first paying client to creating multiple six-figure coaches and millions in collective results.



From Singapore to the USA, Europe to Malaysia, our clients have transformed by learning how to lead with identity, message, and community — the foundation of movement-based marketing.



Our Programs



Every program is built on one belief:

Movements create 
ntum. Leaders don’t chase — they attract.

- Introvert Advantage™ Challenge – Activate your unique introvert power

- Mission to Movement™ – Niche, message, and build your first tribe

- Platinum (25K) – Grow to $100K–$300K with events & audience-building

- Elites (5K) – Start your coaching business with your expertise and get your first clients



Each program is powered by our proprietary method for high-ticket transformation.



How We’re Different

Unlike most coaching companies, we don’t teach theory. I built a multi-7-figure coaching business organically, coached 400+ clients, and created multiple 6-figure coaches — all without ads, fancy funnels, or a big team.



Everything we teach is battle-tested in our own business and inside our clients’ businesses.

That’s why our results are consistent, predictable, and transformational.



Why Work Here



Joining us means joining a global movement. Your work directly impacts real entrepreneurs, real families, and real lives. You’ll be part of a high-performing, heart-driven team building the world’s leading introvert entrepreneur brand — with opportunities to travel for retreats, events, and team experiences.



If you want a job, look elsewhere.



If you want to help build a real movement… welcome home.



Ready to become our Ads Strategist and scale to 6-figure monthly ad spend?

 your application to 
 today.



We're excited to meet you!

title: Project Estimator
description:
PRIOR RECENT EXPERIENCE IN ESTIMATING BLINDS, CURTAINS AND ACOUSTIC PRODUCTS FOR THE UK CONSTRUCTION MARKET IS REQUIRED.

ONLY APPLY IF YOU CAN SHOW REAL, RECENT UK FITOUT ESTIMATING WORK.

APPLICATIONS WITHOUT PROOF WILL NOT BE REVIEWED.



Pre?Screening Requirement

Include your answers in your cover letter. Applications missing these answers will be rejected automatically.



1. List three UK fitout projects where you personally estimated blinds, curtains or acoustic products.

2. State which UK suppliers you have previously requested quotations from and for which products.

3. Provide one example of your takeoff or markup work using Bluebeam or similar software.



Job Purpose

We are hiring an Estimator to support London commercial office fitout projects, specialising in blinds, curtains and acoustic finishes. You must already understand UK construction methods, UK suppliers, UK pricing structures and fitout tendering. This is a part?time role with potential to grow into full?time based on performance, reliability and output quality.

This role involves direct estimating work for premium London office projects. You must be able to work accurately, consistently and at UK commercial standards. Only candidates with recent, proven UK fitout estimating experience will be considered.



Responsibilities

Read and interpret drawings, specifications and BOQs to produce accurate takeoffs and estimates.

Request and negotiate quotations from UK suppliers and subcontractors.

Prepare complete cost breakdowns including labour, materials, preliminaries and risk allowances.

Understand installation sequencing, tolerances and fitout buildability.

Maintain updated knowledge of UK regulations and finishing trade practices.

Work closely with project managers and surveyors.

Keep estimating files organised and audit?ready.

Provide daily updates without follow?up.

Work with consistency, accuracy and attention to detail.



Qualifications

English C2 level.

Strong understanding of UK construction contracts and UK fitout practices.

High accuracy in takeoffs and measurements.

Proficient in Bluebeam, MS Office, CAD tools and CRM systems.

Clear written communication suitable for UK commercial clients.

Able to work independently and make commercially sound decisions.

Experience

Minimum three years of recent experience estimating blinds, curtains and acoustic products for the UK construction market.

Applicants without UK?specific evidence will not be considered.



Wage

USD 12.00 to USD 15.00 per hour depending on experience and output quality.



Schedule

08:00 to 17:00 UK time

Three days per week.



Work Setup

Remote work.



How to Apply

Send your CV and cover letter including answers to the pre?screening questions. Provide proof of UK fitout estimating work and links to companies and suppliers you have worked with. Add JDE/2 in your subject line.

: 



Only shortlisted applicants will be contacted.

title: Google Media Ads Buyer (Remote & flexible)
description:
Help scale brands. Own performance. Drive real revenue.



GTE is a fast-growing global eCommerce company where great ideas don’t sit in slides — they turn into real, measurable growth. We build and scale online brands across international markets, and our tea
mbers take real ownership, grow fast, and help shape the future of the company.



We’re now looking for a performance-driven Google Ads Media Buyer to help take our main revenue channel to the next level.



Why This Role Matters



Google Ads drives around 90% of our total company revenue. That means your work won’t just “support marketing”, it will directly influence the growth of the entire business.



This role is perfect for someone who loves improving systems, scaling performance, and turning data into smarter decisions. You won’t just manage campaigns, you’ll help evolve the way we run Google Ads.



What You’ll Be Responsible For



From day one, you’ll have real ownership. Within your first 90 days, success in this role will mean:

- Developing and rolling out a new or significantly improved Google Ads strategy

- Restructuring and optimizing Google Shopping campaigns for stronger scalability and efficiency

- Driving measurable performance improvements, targeting a 20%+ increase in revenue from Google Ads

- Using performance data to continuously refine bidding strategies, campaign structure, and product feed performance

- Your goal is simple: turn ad spend into scalable, profitable growth.



What We’re Looking For



We’re excited to work with someone who:

- Has at least 3 years of hands-on experience in performance marketing or media buying

- Has direct experience running Google Shopping campaigns for large eCommerce catalogs (10,000+ products)

- Has managed high-budget ad accounts ($300K+ per month)

- Is highly proficient in Google Ads, Google Merchant Center, and Google Analytics

- Ideally has experience with Google CSS Labelizer

- Thinks analytically and uses data to drive decisions, not guesswork

- Enjoys testing, optimizing, and uncovering performance opportunities others might miss

- Is comfortable taking full ownership of results and being accountable for revenue impact



Hiring Process

As part of our process, shortlisted candidates will complete a 19-minute Google Ads knowledge assessment. This helps us understand your hands-on expertise before moving forward to the HR interview stage.



Preferred Candidate Location

We are specifically targeting candidates based in the Philippines, India, Pakistan, Argentina, Colombia, Mexico, Brazil, and Vietnam.



Ready to Grow With Us?

If you’re looking for a role where your work matters, your growth is supported, and your impact is visible — we’d love to hear from you.

title: Video editor and Cinematographer
description:
We are jYU Studios, a small, high-taste content and social media studio. We manage social media strategy and content for a handful of clients across Instagram and LinkedIn. Run by me and my partner, our clients love our vibe and style of our content. Our clients come to us for our highly-personable approach, and we need help to keep the positivity growing.



I would humbly say our work is known for strong aesthetic, restraint, and emotion-first storytelling. We do not chase trends or viral formulas. We try our best to focus on quality, mood, and premium brand feel.



We are hiring a remote video editor who can cut short-form content with strong rhythm, clean storytelling, and tasteful color grading. You will edit mainly for Instagram Reels and LinkedIn video.



What you will do



Edit 20 to 1:45 second reels from our footage (events, lifestyle, hospitality, brand 
nts)

Build emotion through pacing, shot selection, and sound

Color grade to match a cinematic, premium feel (clean, modern, not overcooked)

Mix sound properly (music + ambience + dialogue where needed)

Create text overlays and subtitles in a clean, minimal style

Deliver multiple versions: IG 9:16, LinkedIn 1:1 or 4:5, plus story cutdowns

Follow our folder structure, naming, and version control



Our style (read this carefully)

Emotion over coverage. We do not try to show everything.

Clean, minimal, premium. No cheesy templates.

Strong music taste and timing.

Grading that looks expensive and intentional, not heavy or trendy.



Requirements



A portfolio of short-form edits that feel cinematic and premium

Strong color grading ability (DaVinci Resolve preferred, Premiere or capcut ok)

Strong music sense and sound design basics

Able to take feedback fast and improve quickly



Hoping to find an extension of ourselves to create some movie magic.

title: AI PROMPTER / CREATIVE STORYTELLER (Images + Video)
description:
We are looking for a creative mind obsessed with visuals, storytelling, and AI — not someone with a perfect résumé.



This role is for someone who loves creating captivating images and videos, experimenting with AI tools, and turning ideas into scroll-stopping visuals. You do NOT need years of experience. You do NOT need to already know every tool. What matters most is creativity, imagination, taste, and the hunger to master AI prompting at a god-level.



You will be working with one of our partner agencies serving US-based clients across SaaS, Finance, Health & Wellness, Beauty, and Public Figures. Your job is to help create story-driven AI images and videos that feel emotional, premium, and memorable — not generic AI content.



What you’ll be doing:



- Creating story-based AI images and cinematic scenes

- Creating short AI videos and visual narratives

- Producing beauty, health, and wellness visuals that evoke emotion and transformation

- Supporting premium brand visuals for SaaS and finance products

- Building moods, worlds, and visual storytelling concepts

- You will work with advanced tools such as Minimax, VEO3, ComfyUI, and other AI image and video systems.



All tools, frameworks, prompts, training, and feedback are provided by us.



Who this role is for:



- Students or young creatives

- Self-taught designers, editors, or AI enthusiasts

- People experimenting with AI images, videos, or prompts for fun

- Creators obsessed with aesthetics, mood, and storytelling

- Hidden talents who have not had a real opportunity yet



Formal experience is NOT required. A strong creative eye IS required.



What matters most to us:



- Creativity and imagination

- Visual taste and storytelling ability

- Emotional awareness (mood, vibe, feeling)

- Curiosity and willingness to experiment

- Intelligence and ability to learn fast



What matters less to us:



- Degrees

- Years of experience

- Big company names



IMPORTANT – APPLICATION REQUIREMENT:



To apply, you MUST include sample work that shows your creativity.



This can be anything, including:



- AI-generated images

- Short AI videos



- Prompt experiments

- Mood boards or visual concepts

- Personal projects

- Beauty, health, or wellness visuals (preferred)



Client work is NOT required.



Personal experiments are 100% fine, as long as they show creativity and taste.



Applications without sample work will NOT be considered.



How to apply:



Please include:



- A short introduction about yourself

- Why this role excites you

- Links to your creative samples (Google Drive, Notion, Behance, Instagram, etc.)



We do not expect perfection.

We expect potential.



If you’re the type of person who thinks:



“Give me the tools and I’ll become insanely good,”

this role is for you.

title: HR Talent Partner (Marketing & Growth) – HYPETRIBE Portfolio Companies
description:
Talent Partner (Marketing & Growth) – HYPETRIBE Portfolio Companies

Remote (Manila-based) · Occasional meetings in BGC



HYPETRIBE is a US-based venture studio that builds and scales multiple portfolio companies across performance marketing, SaaS, AI, automation, and digital products. Our companies move fast, test aggressively, and care deeply about execution quality.



Because of that, hiring matters a lot. One wrong hire can slow an entire team down. One strong hire can compound results for months or years.



We are not looking for traditional HR.

We are looking for someone who understands how real marketing and product teams work and can help us consistently bring in the right people.



This role is a Talent Partner focused on scouting, screening, and placing talent across multiple HYPETRIBE portfolio companies. You will work closely with founders and team leads who are operators, not corporate managers.



You do not need to use marketing tools, ad platforms, or AI systems yourself. But you must understand how these roles differ in practice. You should clearly know the difference between a junior and a senior media buyer, between a product manager and a venture builder, and between a designer who can actually execute and one who only looks good on a CV.



Judgment matters more here than process.



This role is a strong fit for someone who has recruited for marketing agencies, startups, or performance-driven teams before. You should be comfortable looking at a CV or portfolio and quickly telling whether the experience is real or just buzzwords.



You should also be comfortable saying no. Not every candidate is good enough, and protecting standards is part of the job. Rate negotiation is part of the job as well — done firmly, respectfully, and with the long-term health of the company in mind.



You will recruit across a wide range of roles depending on what our portfolio companies need at the time. This includes performance marketing and growth roles like media buyers, funnel builders, and conversion specialists. It also includes product and design roles such as product managers, venture builders, and UI/UX or product designers. In addition, you will work on AI-enabled and content-driven roles like video editors, AI-assisted designers, and content creators using modern tools.



You are not expected to master these tools. What matters is your ability to pre-qualify candidates correctly and spot real potential early.



On a day-to-day level, you will source and scout candidates across multiple platforms, review CVs and portfolios critically, and conduct first-round screening interviews. Your goal is to shortlist only candidates who are genuinely worth a founder’s time.



You will coordinate interviews with founders and team leads, manage hiring pipelines clearly, and handle compensation discussions within defined ranges. Over time, you will also build long-term relationships with strong candidates, even when there is no immediate opening.



This is not an admin role.

We are not looking for someone who forwards candidates without proper screening, avoids difficult conversations about money, or treats recruiting as a checklist task.



We are looking for someone with high emotional intelligence, strong loyalty to the venture studio and its portfolio companies, and a long-term mindset. Someone who understands that protecting hiring standards and costs is just as important as filling roles.



The role is fully remote and Manila-based. The BGC office is used only for weekly or occasional in-person meetings. Working hours are flexible and depend on hiring activity rather than fixed shifts.



Compensation is not listed publicly. Please include your monthly salary expectation in your application.



When applying, please share the types of roles you have recruited for before and the kinds of companies, agencies, or industries you have worked with. If you want, you can also include a short example of a difficult or high-impact hire you successfully closed.



This role has real influence.

Hiring the wrong people slows everything down.

Hiring the right people compounds growth across the entire portfolio.



If you take pride in hiring quality and protecting standards, you’ll fit in well here.

title: Venture Product Manager (US Based, remote but meetings in Manila required)
description:
Venture Product Manager

Remote (Manila) · Occasional in-person meetings in BGC



For a HYPETRIBE portfolio company (US-based)



About HYPETRIBE




 is a venture studio that builds, launches, and scales multiple companies across SaaS, AI, automation, marketplaces, and digital products.



We’re recruiting Venture Product Managers for some of our portfolio companies, working closely with founders and cross-functional leads. This role sits at the intersection of product, execution, and experimentation.



This is not a corporate PM role. It’s a build-first role inside an early-stage environment where things evolve fast.



About the role



As a Venture Product Manager, you’ll help take products from idea ? prototype ? live experiment ? iteration. You’ll work directly with founders and coordinate across tech, design, content, and growth.



This role favors people who can unlearn, relearn, and learn fast — not people rigidly attached to a single framework or process.

There is long-term upside for people who consistently show ownership and builder mindset (Future Founder Track).



Location & working style



Remote-first (Manila-based)

BGC office is used only for weekly or occasional leadership meetings

Not a daily office role

You’ll collaborate with US-based founders and global teams



What you’ll do



Translate founder ideas into clear product concepts and MVPs

Prototype quickly using the right tools (no-code, low-code, specs, wireframes)



Coordinate and align with:



Founder(s)

Tech Manager / Developers

UI/UX Designers

Content Manager

Outreach / Marketing Manager



Own products within your lane, not just tasks or tickets

Make fast decisions under uncertainty

Continuously refine products based on real feedback and data



What we’re looking for



Strong product thinking with real-world execution experience

Experience building or shipping products such as:

- SaaS

- AI & automation tools

- Marketplaces

- Digital Products and Consumer Applications



AI-savvy: comfortable using AI tools in daily work

Experience with AI agents is a plus, not a requirement

Flexible mindset — able to adapt across different products, industries, and teams

Willingness to drop old habits, frameworks, or “how it’s usually done”

Clear communicator across technical and non-technical teams



Important: flexibility over process



We are not looking for someone married to one methodology or toolset.



We want people who:



Can learn new tools quickly

Can unlearn outdated assumptions

Can adapt their approach based on the product and team



How to apply



When applying, please include:



What types of products or software you’ve built (SaaS, AI, automation, marketplaces, etc.)

Your industry expertise (if any)

Your salary expectation

A product / products, tool, or system you’ve helped build or launch



Final note



This role is designed for people who want real ownership, not just a title. If you’re excited by ambiguity, fast iteration, and building products that actually ship — this will feel energizing.

title: Offer Architect / Direct Response Expert
description:
We are a global media company with a fast-growing Direct Response division. We create offers across Nutra, Dating, Survival, BizOpp, Finance, and Personal Development. Our work touches platforms like ClickBank, Digistore, Meta, YouTube, Native, and TikTok. We already have an amazing team in Manila and are now expanding.



We are hiring a REMOTE PH-based Offer Architect / Direct Response Copywriter, available part-time or full-time. This role is for someone who understands real DR fundamentals—offer architecture, VSL storytelling, big ideas, unique mechanisms, emotional triggers, and high-converting funnel structures—not traditional branding.



You will help shape complete offers from start to finish: big idea ? mechanism ? angles ? hooks ? VSL structure ? presells ? upsells. If you have experience in any direct response vertical, you’re welcome to apply.



Your responsibilities include:



• Creating offer architectures and mechanism-based positioning

• Writing long-form VSLs (8k–20k words) in clear Grade-5 English

• Building presell pages, advertorials, quiz funnels, and upsell paths

• Developing hook libraries, angle matrices, and curiosity-driven opens

• Collaborating with media buyers to optimize CPA, AOV, EPC, and funnel flow

• Studying competitor funnels and reverse engineering winners

• Creating compliant cold-traffic messaging for Meta & YouTube

• Using DR frameworks (RMBC, Agora principles, Todd Brown USP)

• Working with AI tools for research, ideation, and B-roll briefing



We offer long-term stability, weekly pay, and the chance to grow inside a global media ecosystem with a strong presence in Manila. You’ll join a supportive performance team that values speed, clarity, creativity, and execution.



If you have real DR experience and want to work on ambitious, high-impact offers, we would love to meet you.

title: Short-Form Video Creator / Editor (YouTube Shorts & TikTok) – B2B Construction Materials
description:
Job Title: Short-Form Video Creator / Editor (YouTube Shorts & TikTok) – B2B Construction Materials



Hours: Part-time 5-10 hours month month

Experience Required: Minimum 2 years in short-form video creation/editing





________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________



PITCH REQUIRED TO APPLY FOR THIS JOB - PITCH YOUR BEST 30 SECOND WORK BELOW IN YOUR APPLICATION



To apply please create 1 product youtube short for our range of existing videos - you can pick the angle, content, script. Winner gets the job: 



________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

TO APPLY FOR THIS ROLE YOU MUST HAVE A GOOD UNDERSTANDING OF THE COMMERCIAL SIDE OF YOUTUBE SHORTS. IN THAT WE ARE CREATING CONTENT TO GEENRATE AN AUDIENCE AND ULTIMATELY BUILD A CUSTOMER BASE FOR OUR BUILDING MATERIALS PRODUCTS. YOU SHOULD HAVE A GOOD UNDERSTANDING OF UKW/WESTERN CULTURES AND AUDIENCES & TRENDS WITH REGARDS SHORT FORM VIDEO ESPECIALLY IN THE B2B CONSTRUCTION SECTOR AND UNDERSTAND OUR CUSTOMER BASE/VIEWERS. WE DONT WANT SOMEONE WHO CAN CUT LONG VIDEOS INTO SHORT SECTIONS, THERE IS AI FOR THAT. WE WANT SOMEONE WHO UNDERSTANDS OUR AUDIENCE AND CATERS VIDEO CONTENT, FORM, STYLE, VOICEOVER AND SUBTITLES FOR THAT. THIS WILL INCLUDE CONSTANT LEARNING AND LOOKING AT COMPETITOR / SUCCESSFUL SHORT FOR VIDEOS IN THE MARKET.



About the Role



We are a fast-growing UK B2B construction materials company seeking a highly creative Short-Form Video Creator/Editor to produce eye-catching, professional YouTube Shorts and TikTok videos. You’ll work with our existing library of video footage, supplier content, and brand collaborations to create engaging, on-brand short-form videos that drive awareness, engagement, and conversions.



You will be responsible for editing and producing visually compelling, keyword-optimised videos with strong hooks, captions, and calls to action, ensuring all content aligns with our brand tone and B2B audience.



Key Responsibilities



Create, edit, and publish short-form videos (YouTube Shorts, TikTok, Reels) using existing company footage, supplier media, and AI-generated voiceovers when required.



Develop strong hooks, titles, and keywords to maximise video visibility and SEO performance.



Add on-brand captions/subtitles and integrate graphics, overlays, and transitions to keep videos engaging.



Collaborate with marketing and product teams to identify high-impact content themes (product demos, comparisons, installation guides, etc.).



Optimise videos for each platform’s algorithm and best practices (aspect ratio, retention rates, hashtags, etc.).



Stay up to date with construction industry trends and competitor video styles to continually improve content quality.



Requirements



Minimum 2 years of experience creating and editing short-form videos for YouTube Shorts, TikTok, or Instagram Reels.



Proven ability to create engaging videos from existing footage and stock content.



Experience with AI voiceovers, subtitling, and captioning tools.



Strong understanding of video SEO, including titles, descriptions, and keyword strategies.



Excellent visual storytelling, attention to detail, and understanding of pacing for short-form content.



Experience in or familiarity with B2B, trade, or construction materials industries is an advantage.



Proficient with video editing tools (Premiere Pro, CapCut, DaVinci Resolve, Final Cut, etc.).



To Apply



Please include the following in your application:



A brief outline of your experience relevant to this role.



Your availability (hours per week).



Your hourly rate or project rate.



Links to your most successful YouTube Shorts (that you personally created and edited).



For each example, please include:



Target market (e.g., tradespeople, homeowners, suppliers)



Customer base (B2B, B2C, etc.)



Brand/product name featured in the video



Verification: Evidence will be requested to confirm the authenticity of your submitted work (e.g., screenshots from YouTube backend or raw video files). Only provide examples that you have personally and genuinely created.

title: Supply Chain Specialist Full Time (EU ecommerce)
description:
Reports to: COO

Location: Remote

Employment Type: Full Time

Rate: $1000 or Depending on experience

Work Hours: 4PM – 12AM Manila time



Are you detail-oriented, organized, and experienced in handling product data and coordination tasks?  We’re looking for a Full-Time Supply Chain Specialist to join our growing team!



About Onebird

Onebird is a Netherlands-based e-commerce business in the home décor and personal equipment space, selling exclusively on 
. We operate multiple growing brands and generate millions in annual revenue, with strong plans to scale further. As we expand our product portfolio, we are growing our remote team and looking for talented professionals to help build scalable, high-impact operations."



About the Role

The Supply Chain Specialist supports the business by ensuring accurate data, smooth supplier coordination, and reliable inventory flow. This role focuses on reporting, dashboarding, PO execution, and day-to-day coordination with suppliers and 3PL partners to protect revenue and operational performance. This is a key growth role with potential to evolve into a leadership position, eventually overseeing the entire supply chain department.



Key Responsibilities

Maintain and update supply chain reports and dashboards

Prepare and process approved Purchase Orders (POs) accurately and on time

Coordinate daily with suppliers and 3PL partners on orders and deliveries

Track inventory movements, inbound shipments, and delivery timelines

Support inventory availability and replenishment planning

Lead dashboarding and reporting improvement projects

Perform data mining and analysis to identify risks and opportunities

Flag potential supply issues proactively to the COO and stakeholders





Key KPIs

- Report and dashboard accuracy

- PO accuracy and cycle time

- On-time Order to Delivery

- Stock risk escalation timeliness



Requirements

- Experience in supply chain, operations, or logistics

- Strong Excel / data analysis skills

- High accuracy and process discipline

- Excellent communication skills, with the ability to coordinate effectively with suppliers, 3PL partners, and internal teams

- Comfortable working with suppliers and external partners

- Able to handle projects from planning to execution

- Ability to create, maintain, and improve Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) to ensure smooth and scalable operations



Soft Skills

Attention to details, Proactive, Communicate Effectively, Positive Attitude, Time Sensitive and Adaptable





How to apply: Kindly send a link of your updated CV via onlinejobs

title: Senior Amazon PPC Manager (Full-Time, Remote | $1,500–$2,000)
description:
Senior Amazon PPC Manager (Full-Time, Remote | $1,500–$2,000)

You’ll own Amazon PPC performance across multiple client accounts and help us scale what works: stronger results, cleaner processes, and a better PPC team.



ABOUT BLANKSPACE

Blankspace Commerce GmbH is a fully remote Amazon agency with team hubs in Berlin (Germany) and Barcelona (Spain). We advise international brands - from startups to larger companies - on Amazon & Tiktok strategy and run Amazon & Tiktok accounts full-service, with PPC as a core growth lever.



YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES

* Own Amazon PPC strategy + execution across a portfolio of client accounts/marketplaces (SP/SB/SD), aligned to clear growth efficiency targets.

* Manage budgets and profitability guardrails (e.g., TACoS/ACoS/ROAS), including pacing, bid/budget decisions, and trade-offs - based on data, not gut feel.

* Run a structured weekly optimization cadence (search term hygiene, negatives, bids, budgets, placements, structure) and keep accounts clean, scalable, and predictable.

* Diagnose and fix performance issues fast (root-cause analysis, testing hypotheses, implementing durable fixes) and document learnings to prevent repeat problems.

* Build and improve PPC playbooks/SOPs (account audits, launch/ramp plans, testing frameworks, naming conventions, reporting standards) so performance scales across clients.

* Raise the PPC quality bar across the team through audits, feedback, and coaching; collaborate with Account Managers/Ops so PPC supports client priorities and operational reality.



WHAT SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE

* Clients have clear PPC targets and a reliable reporting/optimization cadence.

* TACoS/efficiency guardrails are hit more consistently while revenue grows on priority accounts.

* Fewer recurring issues: problems are spotted earlier, solved faster, and documented.

* Launches (new products / marketplaces) follow a repeatable playbook with strong ramp and stabilization.

* The PPC department runs smoother: better SOPs, better prioritization, stronger team output.



MUST-HAVE REQUIREMENTS

* 3+ years hands-on Amazon PPC experience with measurable results (agency or multi-brand preferred).

* Confident managing multiple accounts/marketplaces with a clear weekly optimization cadence and prioritization system.

* Strong experience with Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, and Sponsored Display at scale.

* Data-driven optimizer: solid Google Sheets/Excel skills and clear decision-making based on performance data.

* Comfortable owning budgets + efficiency targets (e.g., TACoS/ACoS/ROAS) while supporting revenue growth.

* Strong English communication (written + spoken); German is a plus.

* Remote-ready with consistent overlap with CET/German business hours.



NICE-TO-HAVE

* Experience with other ad platforms (TikTok Ads, Meta).

* Experience with advanced PPC tooling (Scale Insights, Pacvue etc.).

* Vendor Central experience.

* Track record building SOPs / training plans for teams.



COMPENSATION

* $1,500–$2,000 USD (full-time)



WORKING STYLE

* 100% remote, flexible schedule, with required overlap hours with CET/German business time.

* We plan and execute work in ClickUp.

* You’ll have a weekly 1:1 (incl. CEO touchpoint) and clear weekly priorities.

* We track time spent per client to understand profitability and resourcing (planning tool, not micromanagement).



BENEFITS

* Remote-first setup with flexible hours (outside overlap) - no US working hours.

* High ownership: you’ll directly shape PPC strategy, standards, and team development.

* Clear growth path into PPC Lead / Head of PPC responsibilities as we scale.

* Training support (e.g., courses/coaching) tied to role outcomes and team needs.

* Awesome international team of colleagues to work with.



HIRING PROCESS & TIMELINE

* Apply + answer questionnaire (5-10 minutes)

* 20-min screening call (within ~10 days of application)

* Final interview & Practical PPC task (~90 minutes)

* Offer (typically within a few days after final)



Join us! We offer a great career trajectory and a young and international team



Your Blankspace Commerce Team

________________________________



Please not this is full-time position - we are not interested in working with freelancers who are connected to multiple agencies or companies



APPLICATION - IMPORTANT - PLEASE READ

If you are excited to join our team and help shape the success of our Amazon sellers, we look forward to receiving your application via

->

title: Software Engineer (Direct Client)
description:
Role Title: Software Engineer 

Department: Development 

Reports To: Director of Development

Location: Remote 

Employment Type: Full-time





Position Overview

We are seeking a skilled Software Engineer to join our development team. This role requires a versatile developer capable of bridging modern web application development with lower-level system programming. The ideal candidate will have strong proficiency in C# and the ASP.NET Core framework for building robust web solutions, alongside a solid working knowledge of C for embedded devices.



Key Responsibilities

Application Development: Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code using C# and ASP.NET Core.

System Integration: Utilize C programming knowledge to maintain existing modules, develop interfaces for hardware interaction, or manage Inter-Process Communication (IPC) between managed and unmanaged code.

Full Lifecycle Engineering: Participate in the entire software development lifecycle, from requirement analysis and prototyping to testing, deployment, and maintenance.

Performance Optimization: Analyze and optimize application performance, troubleshooting bottlenecks in 
 and C-based components.

Database Management: Design and maintain database schemas and write efficient SQL queries to support application data needs.

Code Review & Quality: Conduct peer code reviews, write unit and integration tests, and ensure adherence to coding standards and best practices.



Technical Requirements

Essential Skills

C# & .NET Core: Extensive experience with C# (latest versions) and 
 Core / .NET 5+ ecosystem. Strong understanding of object-oriented programming, dependency injection, and asynchronous programming patterns.

ASP.NET Core: Proven experience building web applications and RESTful APIs using ASP.NET Core.

C Programming: Functional knowledge of C. Ability to read, debug, and write C code, specifically in contexts involving memory management, pointers, and interoperability (e.g., P/Invoke).

Database Technologies: Experience with relational databases (e.g., SQL Server, PostgreSQL) and ORM frameworks like Entity Framework Core or Dapper.

Version Control: Proficiency with Git and branching strategies (e.g., Gitflow).



Desirable Skills

Web Front-End: Familiarity with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like Bootstrap or Blazor.

API Documentation: Experience with Swagger/OpenAPI for documenting API specifications.

CI/CD: Understanding of Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment pipelines (e.g., Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions).

Hardware/Embedded: Basic understanding of hardware interfacing or embedded systems is a plus.



Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).

2 years of professional experience in software development.

Personal Attributes

Problem Solver: Analytical mindset with a strong aptitude for debugging complex issues across different technology stacks.

Communicator: Ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders and collaborate effectively within a team.

Continuous Learner: Passion for staying updated with the latest industry trends and technologies.



Kindly send your CV LINK. Failure to follow instructions will be automatically skipped.

title: Junior Accountant - Looking for Aspiring CPAs Wanting to Learn
description:
**About the Role**



As an Accountant with Velu, you will have a direct impact on preparing financial records and tax returns for our clients.



The ideal candidate loves Quickbooks (and is Certified) and has fun being responsible for a variety of bookkeeping and accounting duties including record-keeping, accounts payable, accounts receivable, reconciliations, financial reporting, and payroll. You'll also want to play a part preparing income tax returns.



If you are a proactive, detail-oriented, coachable accountant that has the desire to work in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity!



**Why Join Us?**



You'll join a growing & diverse team that is likes to have fun.



You will have a direct impact keeping our clients organized and financial data in the right place.



You'll be 100% responsible for your results.



We value YOU. We want to hear how we can make the company and your job better.



We work remotely in a fun virtual environment.



Culture that is focused on continued education, teamwork, and career advancement.



**Your Day-to-Day**



Manage all aspects of day-to-day bookkeeping and accounting processes including but not limited to: A/P, A/R, payroll, journal entries, and bank reconciliations.



Work closely and communicate with your teammates to keep them updated and hand off work to the next level.



Prepare journal entries for prepaid expense, deferred revenue, and payroll accounts.



Execute payroll activities using both QuickBooks and 3rd party payroll software providers (preparing payroll and related tax returns).



Manage time tracking process for employees with hours billable to grants, utilizing an online time tracking tool, and extract data to make appropriate payroll entries for financial and grant reporting.



Perform annual 1099 reporting process for vendors for multiple clients.



Prepare monthly and quarterly financial reports, including standard financial reports, budget vs. actual reports, and grant specific financial reports.



Coordinate with outside CPAs and Auditors in preparation of year-end audits.



Support with the development and analysis of annual organizational budgets.



Learn and work in the latest and greatest technology in the field of accounting.



Be willing to pitch in to help with various other projects as needed.



**What You Need to Succeed**



Bachelor’s degree or equivalent with 0-2 years related experience.



1-2 years of accounting experience a plus. CPA and working towards US CPA preferred.

1–2 years of tax preparation experience a plus.

Nonprofit accounting/tax experience (preferred but not required — we’ll train you).



QuickBooks Online experience is a huge plus.



Understand financial statements and how they work together (journal entries, month-end closings, etc.)



Strong experience in Microsoft Office 365.



Working proficiency in Excel (basic formulas, pivot tables, charts, etc.).



Work well with a diverse team of personalities at all levels of management & staff, and external client contacts.



Client-service orientation with great spoken and written English communication skills.



Strong organizational, problem-solving, and analytical skills.



An organized and proactive approach to your work to ensure deadlines are met.



Attention to detail and accuracy; double-checking your work.



Resourcefulness: think for yourself and know when to ask questions.



I'll ask you what your favorite book is. Answer: Miracle Morning



An ability to research, interpret, and apply GAAP, FASB regulations, and other accounting literature.



Desire to learn and assist in the implementation of financial software applicable to your job.



**About Velu**



Velu is a virtual CPA firm that helps nonprofits build strong financial foundations so they can thrive. We combine tax, accounting, and advisory services to deliver a seamless all-in-one experience that gives our clients clarity, confidence, and strategy.



We specialize in serving nonprofits through structured meeting cadences, strategic advisory, and high-touch support. Our team of CPAs brings deep nonprofit expertise and a shared passion for empowering mission-driven organizations.



Our Mission:

“To empower organizations to achieve financial self-sufficiency and sustainable growth through proactive, team-oriented, and innovative accounting and consulting solutions.”



We need selfless, accountable, and innovative people like you to join the team and help change lives.



**How We Work**

Required Work Hours: 6am - 5pm CST

Environment: Virtual office environment where every tea
mber is right down the hall.

Meetings: Daily check-ins and weekly sprints



**Recruitment Process**



Your application will be reviewed by our team. Those moving forward to the next step will be asked to complete a brief 5-question video interview. You will answer questions on your own time via your webcam.



Following that, successful candidates moving to the next round will be asked to complete a personality assessment and participate in a 1-on-1 video interview with our founder & CEO.



Candidates making it to the final step will be asked to complete paid assessments and/or projects.



**Compensation & Benefits**



Technology stipends to cover work-related expenses on top of your ordinary pay.



Reimbursement for CPA review course and up to 4 exams (dependent on FT/PT role and work requirement).



We'll cover any certification or state and national licenses / dues.



Opportunity to learn and work with the latest and greatest technology.



Apply Using This Link --->

title: N8n Developer
description:
We’re looking for an experienced n8n developer who has a strong, hands-on command of n8n. This is not a beginner role. Around 90% of our workflows and automations are built on n8n, so deep expertise with the platform is a must.



In addition to n8n, we need someone who is comfortable building APIs. We already work with two developers who’ve been with us for the past 3–4 months on multiple projects. The scope and budget will be discussed directly with the selected freelancer.



If the collaboration goes well, this can turn into a part-time or full-time role for the next three months, with a strong possibility of extension.



Most importantly, we’re looking for problem-solvers. You should be able to take a problem statement, think through the logic, and build a working solution independently.

title: Customer Success Manager (Dentist)
description:
**This role is open only to qualified dental professionals.



About HealRay

HealRay is an oral health and longevity brand focused on one simple idea: your mouth is the gateway to your overall health. We create science-backed products designed to improve oral hygiene, support whole-body wellness, and help people live longer, healthier lives.

Our customers trust us not just for products—but for guidance, education, and care. That trust is everything to us.



We’re now hiring a Customer Success & Relationship Manager to own the entire customer experience across support, communication, and community—ensuring every interaction strengthens trust, satisfaction, and long-term loyalty.





Role Overview

The Customer Success & Relationship Manager will be the front line of the HealRay brand. This role owns how customers experience HealRay after they purchase—from their first question to long-term engagement in our community.



This is a high-ownership role for someone who combines empathy, operational excellence, and medical credibility. You will manage customer communication across
, tickets, phone, live chat, and social channels, while also launching and growing our private 
munity.

You’ll play a critical role in shaping how customers feel about HealRay—and in feeding real customer insights back into the business.





You will:

- Own customer communication end-to-end across
, tickets, phone, live chat, DMs, and community.

- Resolve customer issues with urgency, clarity, and care—without handoffs or deflection.

- Deliver clear, medically responsible answers to oral-health–related questions while knowing when to escalate.

- Launch, manage, and grow HealRay’s private 
munity.

- Turn customer feedback into actionable insights for product, marketing, and leadership.





Key Responsibilities



1. Customer Support & Relationship Management

- Deliver fast, empathetic, and high-quality support across all customer touchpoints.

- Take full ownership of customer issues from first contact through resolution.

- Improve Trustpilot reviews, CSAT, and refund outcomes through exceptional service.

- Ensure customers feel heard, supported, and confident in HealRay and its products.



2. Support Quality & Resolution Speed

- Maintain fast first-response times across
, tickets, and DMs.

- Prioritize first-contact resolution to minimize back-and-forth.

- Maintain a calm, professional tone even in sensitive or high-stress situations.



3. Community Management & Engagement 
 Group)

- Launch and actively manage a private HealRay 
munity.

- Drive engagement through education, discussion, testimonials, and shared wins.

- Moderate conversations with authority and warmth—science-backed, supportive, and non-salesy.

- Generate oral-health–specific content ideas, discussion prompts, and blog topics based on real customer needs.



4. Customer Feedback & Reporting

- Identify recurring objections, confusion points, and product issues.

- Surface insights that improve product experience, messaging, FAQs, and onboarding.

- Create clear customer summaries and reports for leadership and internal teams.

- Act as the voice of the customer inside the business.





Who You Are

- You genuinely care about people and take pride in solving problems well.

- You communicate clearly, calmly, and confidently—especially around health topics.

- You think in long-term relationships, not just ticket closure.

- You’re organized, reliable, and comfortable owning responsibility.

- You’re curious about oral health, longevity, and the connection between mouth and body health.

- You enjoy helping others understand complex topics in simple, reassuring ways.





Qualifications

- Background as a Registered Dental Hygienist or Doctor of Dental Medicine

- Experience in customer support, patient communication, or customer-facing healthcare roles.

- Excellent written and verbal English communication skills.

- Comfort handling customer conversations across
, phone, live chat, and social platforms.

- Ability to explain oral-health topics responsibly without overstepping into diagnosis or claims.

- Experience with ticketing systems, inbox management, or customer support tools is a plus.

- Experience managing or moderating online communities is a strong plus.





Compensation & Benefits

- Competitive compensation based on experience and location.

- Opportunity for long-term growth and expanded ownership as the brand scales.

- Flexible work setup (remote-friendly).

- The chance to play a meaningful role in improving people’s health and longevity.

title: Creative Designer Fashion Dropshipper
description:
We are looking for an experienced Creative Designer who has worked specifically with fashion dropshipping brands and understands how to create high-performing Meta ad creatives.



This is not a beginner role. We are looking for someone who already understands what performs well on
 and Instagram in terms of data. You should know how to create creatives that generate low CPC, low CPM and high CTR. Performance is more important than just making something look nice.



You will be creating ad creatives for a fashion branded dropshipping business. The focus is on women’s apparel, mainly dresses and similar products. Your work will directly influence campaign performance, so understanding Meta testing and creative iteration is essential.



Your daily responsibility will be to create creatives for 10 products per day. For each product, you will create approximately 7 different creatives. These creatives should include different styles and variations to allow proper testing inside Meta. In some cases, when we are testing collections instead of single products, you will need to create around 10 creatives for that collection.



The goal is to test multiple creative angles per product, identify what performs best based on data, and then scale the winning styles. You should understand how creative diversity helps Meta optimize and why relying on just one style per product can lead to wasted tests.



We are looking for someone who has real experience with fashion dropshipping creatives and understands how to design for performance, not just aesthetics. You should be comfortable working with Canva and familiar with AI tools for creating additional variations when needed. Experience analyzing performance data such as CPC, CPM and CTR is a strong plus.



This is a long-term opportunity for someone who is structured, fast, and comfortable producing consistent daily output. When applying, please include examples of Meta ad creatives you have personally created for fashion or dropshipping brands. Applications without relevant examples will not be considered.



If you understand performance-driven creative production and are confident you can handle this level of daily output, we would love to hear from you.

If you read this job post send me: kobalt 17

title: Order Operations & Supply Chain Manager (Shopify Dropshipping – Experience Required)
description:
Job Description



We operate multiple Shopify dropshipping stores and are looking for an experienced Order Operations and Supply Chain Manager.



Experience with Shopify dropshipping is a must.

This is not a basic customer support role.



You will take full ownership of backend order control, supplier coordination, tracking monitoring and cost control.



Your main goal is to prevent refunds and disputes by identifying problems before they escalate.



Core Responsibilities



Daily checking of all new and unfulfilled orders



Identify order issues such as

Not fulfilled orders

No tracking uploaded

Tracking not moving

Supplier delays

Exceptions in ParcelPanel



Monitor tracking daily seven days per week



Contact suppliers mainly Monday to Saturday



Push suppliers for faster fulfillment and tracking



Price negotiations with suppliers



Daily invoice checking



COGS verification and refund checks



Quality checks on orders before escalation



Reporting on

Lost package rate

Refund rate

Reship rate

Supplier error rate



Maintain and update the order issue tracking sheet



You must think ahead and act fast.



Requirements Mandatory



Proven experience in Shopify dropshipping stores



Experience working with Chinese suppliers



Experience checking tracking daily



Experience handling fulfillment issues



Strong Excel or Google Sheets skills



Able to work independently



Strong execution mindset



If you only have Amazon or eBay experience without dropshipping experience, do not apply.



To Apply Answer These Questions



How many orders per month did you manage



Have you worked with Chinese dropshipping suppliers before



What do you do when tracking does not move for five days



Have you negotiated prices with suppliers before



What tracking tools or apps have you used



Applications without answers will not be reviewed.

title: Organized, detailed and Admin Coordinator Needed for Multi-Client Support
description:
We’re hiring a reliable, detail-driven Administrative Coordinator to support a fast-moving education services team. This role is for someone who can run core admin work independently, communicate with warmth and professionalism, and keep multiple priorities organized without constant re-teaching.



What you’ll do
